name: Cover
description: Automates studio attendance reports into professional invoices. Built for independent instructors who'd rather teach than do admin.

name: Nudge
description: A reminder app that actually syncs. Set it on your phone, get it on your desktop. Simple, persistent, everywhere.

name: Placed
description: See artwork on your walls before you buy. Snap your room, choose a piece, and visualize it in context with AI-powered rendering.

name: Latent Wonder
description: Experiments at the intersection of generative AI and human creativity. Where latent space meets wonder.
